title: Being Poor-Ish Revisited: Reader Questions
description: Edit Alert: During the process of this article, some people more knowledgeable than me on one of the questions popped up - Iâ€™ve edited the article a bit to include their help. I am not a good judge of what articles people are going to like at all. So it is that a number of my posts that I was sure were works of unbelievable and lasting genius got minimal hits, while my article about Q-tips and a quasi-whiny essay about the lifestyle of the poor are my most-shared pieces by a pretty wide margin.
